user.title: Login to OIG
user.description: Enter your login/email and password for OIG Cloud

set_box_mode.name: Set Battery Box Mode
set_box_mode.description: Set the operational mode of the battery box.

mode.name: Battery Mode
mode.description: Select the battery mode: Home 1, Home 2, Home 3, or Home UPS.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge that calling this service modifies a live system. I take full responsibility for the changes and any effects.

set_grid_delivery.name: Set Grid Delivery Mode
set_grid_delivery.description: Configure export of excess production to the grid. Ensure legal permissions are obtained.

mode.name: Grid Export Mode
mode.description: Choose whether grid export is allowed, limited, or disabled.

limit.name: Grid Export Limit (W)
limit.description: Set the maximum allowed export to the grid in watts.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge that enabling this feature modifies a live system. I take full responsibility.

warning.name: Export Warning
warning.description: Before enabling grid export, ensure you have DSO approval. Unauthorized export may lead to penalties.

set_boiler_mode.name: Set Boiler Mode
set_boiler_mode.description: Switch boiler between automatic (CBB) and manual mode.

mode.name: Boiler Mode
mode.description: Select between CBB (automatic) or Manual operation.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge the risks associated with manual boiler mode and accept full responsibility.

set_formating_mode.name: Set Battery Grid Charging
set_formating_mode.description: Enable or disable immediate charging of the battery from the grid.

mode.name: Charging Mode
mode.description: Select to start or stop grid charging of the battery.

limit.name: Target Charge (%)
limit.description: Set the target battery charge percentage.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge that starting battery charging from the grid modifies a live system and accept responsibility.

menu.title: OIG Cloud Configuration
menu.description: Select what you want to configure

data_description.standard_scan_interval: How often to fetch basic data from OIG Cloud (recommended 20-30s)
data_description.username: Email or username for OIG Cloud login
data_description.password: Password for OIG Cloud (leave empty to keep unchanged)

data_description.enable_extended_sensors: Enable extended sensors for detailed system monitoring
data_description.extended_scan_interval: How often to fetch extended data (higher value = less server load)
data_description.disable_extended_stats_api: If you have HTTP 500 errors, disable extended stats API
data_description.enable_extended_battery_sensors: Cell voltages, currents, temperature and detailed battery status
data_description.enable_extended_fve_sensors: Power and currents of individual PV strings
data_description.enable_extended_grid_sensors: Voltages L1/L2/L3, grid frequency, power per phase

data_description.enable_solar_forecast: Enable solar forecast for battery optimization and production prediction
data_description.solar_forecast_mode: How often to update solar forecast
data_description.solar_forecast_api_key: API key for forecast.solar (optional, increases limits)
data_description.solar_forecast_latitude: GPS latitude of your PV system (-90 to 90)
data_description.solar_forecast_longitude: GPS longitude of your PV system (-180 to 180)
data_description.solar_forecast_string1_enabled: Enable first panel string (at least one required)
data_description.solar_forecast_string1_kwp: Installed power of 1st string in kWp
data_description.solar_forecast_string1_declination: Tilt of 1st string panels from horizontal (0-90¬∞)
data_description.solar_forecast_string2_kwp: Installed power of 2nd string in kWp
data_description.solar_forecast_string2_declination: Tilt of 2nd string panels from horizontal (0-90¬∞)

data_description.enable_statistics: Consumption median by time, battery prediction, consumption analysis
data_description.reconfigure_statistics: ‚ö†Ô∏è Deletes all stored historical data and starts over

data_description.enable_battery_prediction: Intelligent charging planning based on spot prices and consumption
data_description.min_capacity_percent: Below this level, grid charging starts (recommended 15-25%)
data_description.home_charge_rate: Maximum charging power of your system from grid
data_description.percentile_conf: Values above this percentile are considered peak (recommended 75-85%)
data_description.max_price_conf: Never charge from grid if price is higher than this value
data_description.total_hours: How far into future to plan charging (recommended 24-48h)

pricing_config.title: Spot Electricity Prices

data.enable_spot_prices: Enable spot electricity prices from OTE

data_description.enable_spot_prices: Download and process spot electricity prices from OTE daily at 13:00
data_description.spot_pricing_model: How commercial price is calculated from raw spot price
data_description.spot_positive_fee_percent: For positive spot price: price √ó (1 + percent/100). E.g. 15% = price √ó 1.15
data_description.spot_negative_fee_percent: For negative spot price: price √ó (1 - percent/100). E.g. 9% = price √ó 0.91
data_description.spot_fixed_fee_mwh: Constant fee in CZK per MWh added to spot price (automatically converted to kWh)
data_description.distribution_fee_kwh: Distribution fee added to final price (usually 1-2 CZK/kWh)
